lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Hapoalim forecast last week that inflation would rise to around 30 pct this year and a second devaluation might be necessary later in the year, following the 9.75 pct devaluation against the dollar in January.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An IMF delegation, which visited Israel this week, issued an interim report praising Israel's success in slashing inflation from 440 pct in 1985 to 19.7 pct last year without triggering mass unemployment.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bank Hapoalim chief economist Petahia Bar-Shavit said real growth of wages in 1986 was about 10 pct, following a fall of between 15 and 20 pct in the second half of 1985 when the government's economic stabilisation programme was introduced.
